ListOfValue.Name: Prism Usages (System types)
ListOfValue.Value: The system is used for pre-production acceptance testing
The system is used for development, so nothing can be expected to work
The system is used for pre-production acceptance testing, sized for production
The system is in production for the customer
The system is a Release Preview Sandbox
The system is no longer in use
The system is a short term sandbox
The system is meant for the support team to reproduce, verify and work with reported issues. Automatically created and deleted.
The system is used for QA/testing
The system is used for STEP training
